29979538.review:
[h1]不错的小众百合AVG游戏，给分7.9/10[/h1]

评分细节如下：
[list]
   [*]画面：9/10
   [*]系统：9/10
   [*]音乐：9/10
   [*]文本：9/10
   [*]剧情：6/10
   [*]无配音 -0.5
[/list]

先问一句有人解锁全CG了么，我CG只有前五页，第三页最后一张没有解锁到，不知道是不是什么隐藏设计，我待会再去试试看。

[b]简单概括一下优缺点：[/b]

  [b]优点[/b]
[list]
    [*]美观的立绘、画面、CG
    [*]优美且搭配合适的背景音乐
    [*]清新细腻的叙事风格
    [*]地道灵活的英文语句
    [*]简约大方的UI设计
    [*]方便的R18补丁获取
[/list]

  [b]缺点[/b]
[list]
    [*]不支持简繁中文
    [*]无角色配音缺乏生趣
    [*]部分立绘脸部略有点崩
    [*]缺乏有趣的情节设计
    [*]没法隐藏对话栏截图
    [*]少许效果音和BGM造成不适
    [*][spoiler]生僻的单词太多（R18情节）导致了边看边查字典的不太好的绅士体验[/spoiler]
[/list]

整体来说，这款游戏给我的印象还是不错的，虽然不是资深百合厨，但也很喜欢这种芳香风格的故事，全文细致的心理刻画更是让人不自觉沉浸其中，阅读中即使少数不认识的生词联系上下文也很容易猜出是什么意思。[strike]（强迫症猜完了还想查一下词典真是破坏游戏体验）[/strike]

从阅读中也能发现，游戏大概是英语母语者所作，里面有很多地道的英文日常文法，包括一些俚语，是英文叙述特有的风格，与考试接触不同（看过一个英国人评价我们雅思考试题有的语法很土的视频），某种意义上也能多积累一点语感，也不算白玩。

然而美中不足的还是剧情，从头到尾基本上没有什么让人眼前一亮的“大剧情”，都是一些日常琐事，最多一个狗血展开二选一，大概是作品本身风格没有打算往那个方向发展，所以没有在剧情上下什么功夫。小剧情上也都是简单的生活，感觉也只是为了让姐妹的性格和特点更加鲜明所设计，二人感情的发展升温也很快，快的有点意外。[spoiler]不过想想血脉至亲之间会有莫名的感觉加上姐姐一见钟情也不算奇怪23333[/spoiler]
整个故事都是Zoey和Iris[strike]（怎么又是Iris）[/strike]的日常调情、小别扭、调情、讲述内心历程、调情、[spoiler]啪啪啪[/spoiler]这些。然而对于两位女主的人物刻画可以说是比较成功的，温柔抖M的姐姐，傲娇抖S的妹妹，可爱prprprpr。

不过作品中传达的部分思想就见仁见智了，我还是认为妹妹这样有点自私吧。作品叙述心理比较清楚，就不做过多评价了。

在GE之后的故事里又将如何？我们不得而知。

[spoiler]最后竟然是亲姐妹这个真的excited！[/spoiler]

29956754.review:
My first review ever so bear with me. This isn't a game whose sole purpose is to be fapfiction. There's a well told, interesting story behind it that concerns a very taboo subject.  Sure, it's two sisters lusting after each other but it's more romantic and intimate than that. Think of it as the difference between fucking and making love.

I thought the dialogue was written very well. I was impressed with some of the vocabulary used and I actually had to look up a couple of the words. The only thing that slightly bothered me about it was a few typos. I think there was like 4 or 5 if I remember correctly, so it's a very minor issue. For example there would be And instead of An, nothing ground breaking. The story was compelling to say the least. I found myself experiencing the same emotions the characters were throughout and really wanting to know what happens next. The humor in the story was a welcomed addition. Music was pleasant and also fit very well. The art is gorgeous. I was looking at this game because of the art and when I read all the positive reviews, it erased any doubt if I should buy it or not. Regardless of all that, I have to emphasize that this is an amazing story. Yes, it's about a very taboo subject. Yes, I completely agree that incest is morally reprehensible. But it's a damn good story and damn good stories deserve to be told.

I played the game with the R18 patch because to be completely honest, I enjoy reading erotica and seeing erotic content. I don't mind if you judge but I'm guessing you enjoy it too if you're contemplating getting this game or not. I recommend the patch but looking at the other reviews, it doesn't seem necessary to enjoy the game. Like I said however, there's a difference between fucking and making love. The scenes from the patch are well written and it helps to visualize the culmination of the physical, mental, and emotional attraction between the two characters.

10/10 Would buy and play again. Kudos to Razz for creating such an amazing visual novel! Definitely have my money and support for any future products you release.

29798293.review:
Can I give this a "both recommended and not recommended"?

Okay, so If you're not usually an ero-fan, if you don't read erotica often, or if you're just really interested that this is the only game with the tag "incest" on Steam at the time of this writing, it's recommended.  You might want to wait til it's on sale, but try it, you'll like it.  Or if not this, one of the other, cheaper erotica games out there, I'm sure you can find one catering to your tastes and kinks.  The rest of this review is not for you.

I mean it.  Shoo.  If you've never heard of Literotica, you don't belong here anymore.  Go read another, three-line review.  

Are they gone?

Allllrighty then.  Hi!  Like me, you probably consider yourself something of a fan of good old written smut.  Perhaps you monitor the Visual Novel Database for new fanpatches.  Maybe you're sick of the same few authors dominating the "incest" tag of Literotica.  Hey, I bet someone reading this even remembers dear departed sistersinlove.com.  This part of the review is for people who know and love sexiness.

And to those people I say, Love Ribbon is nothing special.  It has the narrative speed of an 8-page Literotica story: At one point the story timeskips several months just to say "...and now she's been privately stimulating me for the past few weeks."  The plot beats are predictable, the story ultimately short (2.5 hours for me) and the sex scenes (played with the 18+ patch) sexy, but nothing mind-blowing.

The art is attractive, particularly during the sex scenes (definitely some of the more attractive vulvas I've ever seen in a visual novel) but ultimately very limited (two outfits each?!  Come on, pajamas at least!) and the backgrounds are cheap and flat.

This is asking for eight to ten dollars for a 4.3-star Literotica story and some deviantart-level pictures to go with it.  Love Ribbon is simply not worth it.

29796150.review:
So, this game has it's faults, and they are few.. But it also kicks asses, and there are alot of them. For me, personally, I was already a fan of sisterXsister so that was just a bonus, but wow. Normally I don't go into VN's with all that much expectation or enthusiasm (so many lack heart and depth, or command of the English language..) and so it was with this story, but dayum did it win me over quickly indeed. Honestly, even if wincest isn't your thing... I mean hell, even if YURI isn't your thing - this is still a damn good story, written and illustrated very very well. I never tried it, but I assume there's even a path for a platonic relationship in there somewhere for all the dweebs that can't handle the realness ;)

Anyway, sick game. Already looking forward to a sequel (there IS going to be a sequel, right?) Would heartily recommend, even if you do lose half your friends list for it. ;p


P.S. I would be remiss if I didn't point out some of the specifics, both positive and negative:

Pro's
- Longer than your average VN, took me about 7 hours to fully complete (I probably read slower given the unexpected quantity of feels. Wanna absorb it all, go for the full experience, ya know?)
- Immersive. It's well written, so if you have feelings it will pull you in.
- Choices at unexpected times, and they feel very weighty when you have to make them.
- It's basicly Life is Strange, so if you like Pricefield, you're gunna dig these characters ;D
- It has a very tasteful hentai patch. What more can you ask for, comon!

Con's
- The ending felt rushed in my opinion, emotionally speaking.
- Some choices felt a little contrived-- 'welp, saw that one comin', or the the way the characters responded to particular situations felt out of character, simply so that a choice could exist.
- There weren't an enormous amount of choices, even though the ones that did exist were very important. I'm kinda on the fence about whether I would've liked more. Just something to think about.
- There was no wardrobe option to fix Iris' ridiculous dresses >.>
- It was only 7 hours long... moar plox.
- Like, seriously, it's been two weeks since this came out. Why haven't you announced the sequel yet? Jeez.

29684090.review:
Love Ribbon ties the story of two sisters beginning life on their own. Scholar entrée Iris first meets Zoey during her arrival at Lillium High School. She is immediately awestruck by Zoey’s cool demeanor and quickly questions some mysterious force drawing her to this complete stranger. The prospect of living on her own settles in as Zoey walks off and the unfamiliar environment becomes obvious. This fear, however, is quickly overridden by the news that she is to have a roommate accompany her: Zoey. Oh, and from the words of her dad, they’re both sisters. 

Iris already has to deal with the pressure that comes with her scholar status, but the insatiable thirst to pinpoint the inexplicable attraction she is having for Zoey adds another layer of internal conflict. The initial banters between the two are filled with subtle humor as their personalities clash. Zoey, being more introverted, makes it harder for the already awkward Iris to just crack the ice. It’s a simple premise that may lead one to believe that a romantic comedy is in the works, however, the ensuing events following Zoey’s failure to return home in a timely manner diverges the plot into something more heartfelt and mature.

It was at this point that I began to like Love Ribbon. It would have been okay had it stayed the course of a one-sided attraction littered with occasionally smirk-inducing dialogue, but the conflicts that arose from this shift in plot was what gave me my money’s worth. I completed the game in just over three hours, one ending shy of perfect completion. There are choices to be made, but don’t expect yourself to get lost in their complexities; still, having choices alone is a welcome sight for this genre. Also, certain choices grant hilariously named achievements that do little to provide proper context as to how they were attained which I found rather clever. 

The in-game art style has a painterly feel that complements the font used for text boxes. It’s a nice touch, one that contributes to the heartwarming atmosphere. As far as image variety goes, there are surprisingly many for a game this short. The downloadable image patch also extends this collection of cute and sometimes naughty images. Background music could have used more diversity as the same piano chords often became ambiance instead of emotional steering wheels even during the most pivotal of scenes. 

For those unsure about the themes of the game from the description, yes, there are sensitive material here. However, I do think that they were written with a level of sincere comprehension that allows the touchy subject of sisterly love to become a believable and organic experience for its readers. In other words, it is fairly tamed with depth often unseen in stories similar to Love Ribbon—especially at this price range. 

Many will overlook this game, but there truly is an engaging tale of self-discovery present amidst the two protagonist and the simple setup comprising the first half hour of Love Ribbon. It describes consequences during a tumultuous period: adolescence. I liked my time with Love Ribbon and would honestly love to see more of Iris and Zoey in a sequel. The game does end with enough leeway for a potential follow-up—so who knows.

29602468.review:
Je ne maîtrise pas parfaitement l'anglais et en prenant mon temps, il m'a fallu seulement 5 heures de jeu pour tester une des deux fins disponibles (la fin heureuse, en l'occurence). Cependant, je ne regrette pas mon achat. C'est le premier visual novel que j'achète sur Steam et je me suis dit que ce serait un investissement sympa, j'ai eu raison.
D'abord, l'esthétique est douce, agréable, girly, autant pour le chara-design, les décors, que pour la musique.
Cette histoire pleine de rebondissements entre deux soeurs qui deviennent amantes m'a plue... Il fallait oser 
L'histoire est émouvante, dramatique, voire tragique selon la fin que vous choisirez, sans être gnan-gnan.

Je suis très satisfaite sans dire que c'est le jeu de l'année non plus. Mais je dois reconnaître que dans certains visual novels, l'action traîne un peu, ça se répand en bavardages, alors qu'un point fort de ce jeu est qu'on ne s'ennuie jamais : il y a de l'humour (MINI-SPOIL : Iris ne comprend pas les allusions qui sont sous-entendues par Zoey dans les termes "eat out" et "pink", et si vous ne devinez pas, francophones, je vous laisse chercher par vous-même), du rire, des larmes, du suspense.
Je ne cache pas que même sans télécharger le patch hentai, il y a des scènes qui ne manqueront pas d'en exciter certains. Ah oui, le patch +18 est vraiment sympa et gratuit, go ahead !

Je recommande donc ce jeu si vous avez cinq heures de libres pour fantasmer un peu, vous échapper de la réalité, et vivre une belle histoire.

29586217.review:
This Visual Novel is exactly what you'd expect, which is a good thing. It's a high quality looking experience tackling a subject that people love to indulge in: Incest! There's no big plot twist, no ironic post-modern messages or anything. It's a story about two sisters who want to smash eachother and it unfolds exactly as you could imagine if you gave it 5 minutes of thought. Is that a bad thing? No. 

It's just the right length to explore the subject matter enough without leaving you wanting more, the entire experience is paced very well and to that merit it's priced appropriately too. There's a few silly references to other yuri / incest media such as Oreimo and a Frozen reference which made me giggle, the first half of the game has some surprisingly charming humor.

The music isn't anything to write home about, however it's always thematically appropriate for the scene. The art is wonderful, although there's only two characters every shown on screen with dedicated art, they have a variety of expressions and the soft flat colouring looks great. The game has tons of backgrounds though, and they all look incredibly professional. The H scenes, assuming you patch them in, are surprisingly realistic.

Each character in the game fills a specific stereotype and there isn't much development, you get your description of the character the first time they're introduced and then that's it besides the whole falling in love stuff nobody really changes, which is fine! I don't expect a grand narrative and character development in a 4 hour VN. 

As for writing it's pretty standard, the author is good at description and is clearly knowledgable on how your average anime girl talks, because that's exactly what the protagonist is. I only found one typo in the entire time I played the game, which will probably be patched out by the time you read this.

All in all, a nice little feel good experience for your afternoon. A classic take on the Yuri "genre" presented with wonderful art and a neat twist in the whole taboo nature of incest. I just wish I had a father half as supportive as the one in this game, maybe then I wouldn't have turned into the kind of guy who writes reviews for incest hentai novels.

7/10

I completed it in one sit, wich is rare, i usually get tired much quicker with visual novels.

Despite some glaring problems (a few corny lines of dialog here and there, and the overwhelmingly bland and one-dimensional side-characters), i enjoyed the game quite a bit. The main focus is romance though, so if you are looking for something else, you wont find it here.

If you like romance stories, and can look past or even enjoy  the taboo subject at hand (incest), this game is worth your time (about 4 and a half hours, in my case)

Sex, by the way, is not the main focus of the story. It plays a big role, but this is not porn, and you can perfectly play it without the +18 patch, if you are so inclined, you are not missing on anything.

Even if this game is not a masterpiece of its genre, i don't regret the purchase, and 9.99 is a very reasonable price for something that must have taken quite a bit of effort to make, especially for a small team.

Yui-chan's Guide to the Perverse;

1. Purchase Game.
2. Visit this link: [spoiler]http://razzartvisual.com/2017/01/24/love-ribbon-18-patch/[/spoiler]
3. Download Patch from either the Google Drive link, or the Mirror link.
4. Copy into Game Folder. e.g; (D:\Program File (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Love Ribbon\game)
5. Launch and enjoy. ;)

[b]Review:[/b]
I usually don't post serious reviews, but for this game I thought I'd give my two cents. Love Ribbon explores the relationship between two blood-related siblings; how they see eachother, and how the world would see them.

As a very taboo subject, it's quite refreshing to see what sort of circumstances would cause such a bond between two siblings. The story itself is well written, explaining their situation, their feelings of love, guilt, hurt, abandonment and acceptance. Both endings, good and bad, are potential real world outcomes if two siblings (unbeknownst or not) would have an intimate relationship with one another. I found myself questioning my own morals and prejudices when explained the gravity of the situation that brought the two to this relationship. Although some of the choices you will make will not affect the outcome, there are some choices that will leave you wondering; 'Was this the right thing to do?'. 

Overall, it is an excellent VN and I would highly recommend it to anyone wanting to read something with a subject heavily underlined in morales and personal beliefs.

29559159.review:
*WARNING* There may be some minor spoilers ahead, but I shall do my best to avoid anything that really gives any of the story away




Well, this has been my second full-on yuri visual novel that I've purchased on Steam, and I've gotta say, while it may be shorter than Kindred Spirits, and be more expensive proportional to the time it took to go through it, it's right up there in the same league with it. 

It'd be dishonest of me if I didn't admit that the plot revolving around a blossoming love between two long-lost sisters was a huge selling point for me, and one of the primary things that piqued my interest over some of the other yuri VN's floating around on Steam. I initially was quite concerned that it would be handled less as an actual plot device, more as something thrown in just to entice people to buy it, only to be treated as something that wasn't out of the ordinary within the story itself. It's safe to say that I was pleasently surprised, and that was not the case whatsoever. Every character, even Iris and Zoey, bring up how unusual such an arrangement is, and the stigma and taboo associated with it are a major component of the plot, driving much of the story forward after about a quarter of the way in. It seemed like a very realistic portrayal of how this sort of relationship would be taken in reality, and I have to say that I absolutely adored that facet of this VN. 

The CG were all top notch, both the normal character ones seen in most dialogue, the ones in the romantic scenes, and, if you decide to get the 18+ patch, which is linked on the main menu of the game, the hentai cg as well. The art style is utterly beautiful, and velvety smooth. The only gripe I have is that some of them did seem a tad bit washed out at times, but that's likely part of the intent, so it's more of a very minor personal issue than it is something legitimately flawed with the VN. 

Much like in my review of the previously mentioned Kindred Spirits, I must give a warning to people buying this for certain reasons. While this game is clearly written, at least in part, for people who have a more... carnal love for yuri (especially yuri involving sisters), it is not written purely for that, and you may be disappointed to find it not quite the fap material you may have been looking for. While it does have some quite explicit language, it is mixed quite well with some realistically emotional dialogue, and I'd say it leans quite a bit more towards being adorably sweet and emotional than it does towards being lewd. For me this is not a gripe at all, as I do prefer the emotional to the lewd, but I know that some of you who are interested might lean the opposite way.

Regardless, I would certainly recommend that anyone who adores a good love story, and doesn't mind a touch of fictional incest, give this adorable story a try. It may not be the longest VN out there, but it's got heart, it's got character, and it handles the topics it deals with great care.

I give this VN 8 out of 10 burnt oven mitts.

29548510.review:
Another fantastic game from the same developer that give us the also fantastic Starlight Vega. 

This time is the tale of two sisters, the cute and diligent Iris, and the cool and aloof Zoey. They didn't even know of each other existence until they are set to live together in an apartment while attending the same school.
While they don't start on good terms soon they start to bond. And their relationship starts to go beyond of the relationship of two sisters.

How they will deal with their new found feelings? How this will affect their lives? And will the world accept them if they decide to walk the forbidden path?

All of this you will find if you follow their story. With adorable, fun and cute moments, but also with tense and dramatic moments their story will unfold.

The Backgrounds and music are really nice. The interface is simple and well done. And the characters are pretty and with plenty of expressions. 
And the story is pretty well written. I enjoyed it a lot. The interactions betweeen the sisters are a joy to read. Plenty of fun and lightheart moments, and when drama hits, hits hard. A good ride, without doubt.

And of course, the lewd scenes, with some nice animations. They're nice. 

Long story short, a great Yuri Visual Novel, with some nice and cute slice of life, good drama and charming characters.
Razzart did it again!

29538357.review:
Всем доброго времени суток! Хочу начать с того, что за судьбой Love Ribbon я следил относительно давно, так как знаком с предыдущим проектом Razzart Visual "Starlight Vega" (можете даже прочитать мой обзор на него), на странице которого и было размещено сообщение об этой новелле и её "особенностях", поэтому, едва получив оповещение о выходе в свет, приобрёл её. Сразу скажу, что руководствовался я исключительно личным интересом и желанием познакомиться со столь неординарным представителем своего направления, и, должен сказать, новелла меня не разочаровала, но обо всём по порядку.
Лишний раз не помешает обозначить, что новелла представлена только на английском языке, и имеет поджанр юри, то есть присутствуют романтические взаимоотношения двух персонажей женского пола.
Окей, что там дальше? Ах да, рисовка. Рисовка мне понравилась, фоны и анимированные CG выполнены очень добротно и детально, однако немного огорчает малое разнообразие спрайтов (их по сути две штуки, если не учитывать разнообразные эмоции), да и выполнены они почему-то хуже, чем CG. Может быть так и задумано, или мне просто показалось?
Сюжет прост как пять рублей, однако тем не менее заставляет проникнуться эмоциями персонажей и сопереживать им благодаря глубокой романтической составляющей с небольшой примесью трагедии. Должен отметить некоторую затянутость в определённых местах, которая тем не менее не особо мешает вникать в происходящее.
Музыка. Увы и ах, сказать по большому счёту нечего. Или это я так зачитался, что перестал обращать внимание на сопровождающую музыку, но ничему необычного, такого, чтобы потом специально искать и сохранять к себе в аудиозаписи, я не заметил.
Меркантильная составляющая. Я приобрёл Ленточку со стандартной для нововышедших новелл 10%-ной скидкой, однако о потраченных деньгах не жалею, и если уж и вы решили купить, то уверен, что и вы не пожалеете (для любителей карточек - выпадает 3 штуки, средняя цена 43 рубля).
В заключении хотелось бы сказать, что если всё, что вам стало известно об этой новелле, вас не отпугнуло, то я РЕКОМЕНДУЮ её к прочтению, ибо запретный плод сладок! Спасибо за внимание.

29538079.review:
[h1] 看这位小姐姬气十足，适合去骨科或是一迅社深造	[/h1]
从绿光上就开始等的作品，等到了上架和发售，当我得知了这个消息的时候，我是从床上跳了起来。
才玩儿了个相遇+磨合期，按耐不住激动的心情来写个测评，望抛砖引玉。
先列一下优点：（以下部分优点以玩家百合素养为前提）
1.画风柔和，画面优秀
这个从先行预告短片就能看出来。由于作者之前的作品有时候会出现作画崩坏的情况，到目前为止除了立绘有那么一丁点可以忽略不计的小崩以外，cg什么的都很正常，人物设定风格也很对胃口。
2.UI简洁
UI没有繁琐功能，游戏中右键可以直接进行load，但没有看到q.save和q.load的功能。
3.语言流畅，不失美感
玩到现在为止，文本的词汇量并不是很大，但是描写却能做的很优美，也许是因为不像那些由日文二次翻译来的文本一样，所以作为visual novel阅读起来很流畅，之前玩的时候也有在给朋友同步翻译，朋友也感觉文本语言运用还是有技术的。（在这里奶一口，可能想要中文版得要很久因为发展应该不是很快，文本总量可能不会很小，相信大家静下心去玩，英语能力不会是问题，还望不要喊着We need Chinese然后狠心点下差评）
4.姐妹
这个还用我说？Iris粉毛姐姐可是拿奖学金的优等生，[strike] 和某作品的金毛姐姐完全不一样啊	[/strike]。
[spoiler] 妹妹刚遇见姐姐的时候也是狂盐了一波，理都不理，后来才慢慢成为了诱攻	[/spoiler]，没错，我就是站妹攻。妹妹还是个有音乐天分的优等生，再加分！
5.[strike] 粉黑	[/strike]

然后是缺点：
1.没有中文
确实没有中文会影响很多同好们的阅读体验，毕竟AVG最重要的还是从文本中感受角色，不是母语英语总归会有些误解或不适。
2.没有CV
cv的缺失也是一个问题，配音能让玩家更贴近角色，不过也有很多没有cv的优秀百合avg的例子，像什么孤独少女的百合物语之类的，所以个人来说问题不大。
3.BGM
也许是个人感觉，Love Ribbon的bgm有时候会让我有些烦躁，而不是像白爱一样能够让我平静下来，背景音的衔接有时候也有些突兀，这个仁者见仁。

由于还没有游玩完毕，所以现在观点还很片面，希望能有更多人提出关于剧情方面的优缺点，不过我相信
甜是很甜的，好评我是不会改的。

So, where do I start?

A lot of fiction tends to skip around squicking anyone, or being potentially hard to sell, by adding "step" before siblings. This VN doesn't. They're sisters. It's a thing. So, if that's what you want? Buy it. You won't regret it.

If that sounds squicky to you, but you like yuri love stories with some erotic bits in there? Still buy it. It's a beautiful story, with beautiful characters, and I adore them both a lot. Maybe you'll find a new taste you like in here? As someone this was basically marketed to directly, I feel a hard time finding a way to convince anyone who wasn't.

The writing is great and made me cry (all good romantic VN should be able to make you cry) with one scene rather happily reminding me of one from the third Sonohana game. No, not the second with the cousins. I know, that's just how it works. Anyway, the art was gorgeous for the touching emotional moments, cute for the slice of lifey moments, and hot for the erotic bits. The music worked well for every scene, and while it does loop a fair bit if you dont read instantly? I liked them enough to enjoy them looping for a long time on some touching moments, and isn't that a more meaningful thing anyway?

Seriously, if you enjoy Yuri VN, check this one out, you will NOT regret it :)

39383190.review:
Если судить о новелле по описанию и некоторым обзорам, то о ней может сложиться несколько неверное ожидание. Потому что на самом деле новелла намного глубже и интереснее, чем может показаться на первый взгляд. Если покупать ее только в ожидании сексуальных сцен на запретную тему, то придет явное разочарование (потому что по сути их всего 2 и немного эротики в части иных сцен). Эта новелла больше об отношениях как таковых: как они начинаются, развиваются, какие проблемы возникают в ходе них. И тема инцеста здесь является краеугольным камнем, которая негативно и крайне драматически влияет на все происходящее. Да, в новелле есть хорошая концовка, но и она развивается не так уж радужно и весело, так как в ней тоже будет немало переживаний и серьезных проблем в ходе ее достижения. Крайне радует, что спустя пару месяцев было выпущено некое послесловие к хорошей концовке, которое отлично отвечает на некоторые вопросы и дает глубокое чувство удовлетворения от увиденного.

Стоит отметить также, что в новелле неплохой саундтрек, который задает нужный ритм и настроение в сценах. Может он не особо запомнится после прохождения, но свою роль выполняет отлично. И это главное. Также здесь отличный визуальный стиль с приятно нарисованными персонажами, фонами, CG'шками. Разве что здесь не так уж много вариаций эмоций, фонов и вообще имеются только две главных героини, а все остальные представлены исключительно текстом. При этом, в новелле присутствует анимация в некоторых сценах! И это очень круто, она смотрится крайне к месту и заметно оживляет происходяшее. Одним из минусов является отсутствие особой вариативности и влияния выборов на сюжет: по сути, здесь есть только один выбор, который влияет на итоговую концовку. И будет довольно очевидно, когда он настанет. С другой стороны, может это и не прям уж недостаток, просто стоит учитывать данную особенность.

В заключении хочется сказать, что новеллу определенно стоит купить, если вы не боитесь таких сложных и запретных тем. Если одно лишь упоминание инцеста вызывает бурю негодования и ненависти, то наверное стоит просто пройти мимо. Если же вы готовы к подобной истории, хотите попробовать понять ее, но не одобряете инцест в целом, то добро пожаловать. Ведь главные героини тоже не до конца принимают и одобряют его, это как раз нормально.

P.S. Велика вероятность, что дополнение у вас не будет установлено и после достижения хорошей концовки вы не получите послесловие к ней, а также не получите достижение Together. Так что лучше сразу пройдите сюда и установите его вручную: http://steamcommunity.com/app/559610/discussions/0/1318835718931684735/

Также имеется 18+ патч: http://razzartvisual.com/2017/01/24/love-ribbon-18-patch/

39365980.review:
"Розовая" новелла о двух кровных сёстрах, с неплохим сюжетом.

Плюсы данной новеллы:

+ Красивое оформление, очень красивая менюшка.
+ Две очень миленькие школьницы
+ Сюжет есть, это радует
+ Дают делать выбор и пристутствуют различные концовки
+ Неплохое музыкальное сопровождение
+ Школьницы+лесби+инцест = C-c-combo!
+ 18+ контент, который обязателен к установке, иначе никак. Лесбийские сцены выполнены достаточно хорошо.

Теперь к минусам:

 - Без поддержки родного языка. Разработчикам пора задуматься о том, чтобы новеллы имели поддержку русскоязычной локализации, иначе многие будут проходить мимо.
- Слишком мало визуальных персонажей. Выполены лишь девушки, да и то мало видов эмоций. Учитель, отец и одноклассники - просто на словах.
- Девушки не меняются, как и их наряды, очень жаль.
- Мало слотов для сохранений и нет возможности убрать текст, прямо во время игры.

Хотя, к новелле, где есть выбор прочистки дымохода, могут быть ещё какие-то претензии? Не думаю.

Однозначно рекомендую данную юри-новеллу к прочтению и не только.

39352841.review:
You don't choose who you get to fall in love with . . .
Love Ribbon is a yuri VN where two sisters fall for eachother. This game has well-written dramatic scenes, animated cutscenes, and a captivating "forbidden love" story.
Love Ribbon's art isn't anything amazing, but still really nice. The music was hit or miss for me, sometimes feeling out of place or repetitive.
You won't learn much about the universe outside of Iris or Zoey but thats ok. What drove this game home for me was learning how far Zoey and Iris would go to embrace oneanother. How would their parents react if they find out? What would happen to Iris' scholarship?

I'd recommend this to anyone that wants to read a good romance/drama with heavy H scenes (download the official 18+ patch). But doesn't mind an ost that isn't too captivating, and sluggish writing at times.

39180214.review:
[h1]怦然心动的恋爱百合剧—《Love RIbbon》[/h1]

[b]本文包含少量剧透，请酌情阅读[/b]

《Love Ribbon》是一款以姐妹百合向为题材的视觉小说作品，又名《爱的丝带》。本作所讲述的是Iris与Zoey，从小便相隔两地从未见过面的两姐妹，数年后在新的学校Lillium High School相遇了，之后二人又在父亲的刻意安排下鬼使神差般的住进了同一所公寓，故事便由此展开。傻白甜的姐姐Iris与黑长直妹妹Zoey会发展出怎样一段感情，这段禁忌之恋又会以怎样的结局收尾？满怀着好奇与渴望，花了2天时间见证了这段感情历程，结束后意犹未尽，很久都未曾感受到的一种怦然心动的感觉，于是写下了这篇安利。 

需要注意的是，本作目前并无中文，很久之前看见倒在麦田汉化组准备接手Love Ribbon的汉化工作，但是最近也没听到什么消息。幸好文本量较少，CET-4 500+基本都能看懂。需要注意本作包含一些羞羞的画面以及剧本，未成年人请在父母陪同下观看。

[h1]人物塑造[/h1]
整个剧情玩下来给我的印象就像是在看一部舞台剧，舞台中心是Iris与Zoey姐妹二人，所有气氛与走向都围绕姐妹二人而展开，算上台词勉强可以将教授与父亲加入到主要角色当中。教授给我的印象就是一名尾行大变态，走到哪里都有他，每当气氛要渐入佳境时总会跑出来毁掉气氛，让人又气又恨。而父亲的角色虽然台词不多但却必不可少，在剧中担任了不仅仅是两名女孩的父亲，还是这段禁忌之恋的“创造者”以及最后发现理解并支持这段感情将Iris托付给Zoey的“见证人”。

Iris作为姐姐，体贴温柔，成绩优异，常年校奖学金获得者，性格方面有些绵绵的，但是在对待这段感情上，Iris敢爱敢恨，真诚而坦率，在她对于Zoey的感情感到迷茫时会直接表达，"Do you hate me, or do you love me? Am I your sister, or the target of your affection?" 对于Zoey的爱意，也毫无保留的向她倾诉，"Because, I love you!"

而Zoey与Iris在两个不同的环境中长大，所以性格冷淡而孤傲，做事也没有太多顾忌，虽然妹妹年龄较小，却早已自立。但是在对待Iris的感情上，Zoey并不像她的性格那样，反而由Iris占据主动，Zoey只能假装醉酒来诱惑姐姐，来满足自己心中那蠢蠢欲动却又不满的欲望。总的来说，Zoey与Iris两姐妹的角色塑造的有血有肉，充满活力，非常喜欢。

[h1]背景音乐[/h1]
全程无配音，不过这我觉得倒没什么，这类游戏如果有了CV感觉会很尴尬。BGM中规中矩，但是可圈可点，有几首和气氛很搭，比如Dad打电话给Iris准备告诉她有关妹妹的事，这时候的BGM显得很俏皮，能身临其境般感受到Iris当时的心情，我甚至能感受到Iris此时在想什么。还有一处是Iris刚在电脑上看完一些羞羞的画面，出门就碰到了Zoey，这时候BGM出来我差点就笑了出来，Iris怎么可以这么可爱~（其实那时候Iris干了什么Zoey从头到尾全都偷看到了...Zoey脸比Iris还要红就能看出来，Zoey后边也会在挑逗Iris的时候告诉她...）

立绘与背景都很精致，但是感觉重复较多，一个表情或者动作经常可以跨过好几段对话，如果再能丰富些就好了。

[h1]剧情分析[/h1]
Zoey早已便知道Iris是自己的姐姐，只是傻傻可爱的Iris一直被蒙在鼓里。于是开头才对Iris那么冷淡，Zoey尽可能的努力着让自己不去爱上Iris，因为姐妹间禁忌的爱不被世俗容忍，这份爱不被社会的价值观所允许，Zoey不单单为自己着想，她也一直在考虑着Iris的感受。但爱情的力量是伟大的，这份爱最终还是让她们走到了一起。

令我印象很深的一个场景就是DNA检测，或许她们早已清楚结果如何，因为她们相爱或许只是为了得到一个安慰也要尝试这大海捞针般渺茫的机会，可以证明她们不是亲姐妹的机会，可以让她们名正言顺的在一起的机会，但是结果显然..... "100% blood-related sisters".

"We both knew from the start... We both knew that we were sisters all along, right!?"
“我们早已知道...从一开始就明白，我们是亲姐妹...”

Zoey对姐姐的爱是让人是让人心疼的，后来发生那件事，Zoey为了保护Iris而独自在外漂泊数年，虽然最终得以重逢，但对于这份感情，双方都经历了太多，也付出了太多。还好结局是美好的，前边可能有些小虐其实都是为了最后给你发糖发个够，甜死你~

[h1]不足之处[/h1]
要说有什么缺陷和不足，我必须要说说这个立绘的问题，Zoey的侧脸是哪个家伙画的？完全画的就是变形了好嘛...我一个外行人都能看出来人脸透视以及角度有很大的问题，这个实在是太影响观看效果了，我就不在这儿贴图了，有兴趣自己感受一下吧。

另外一点就是关于父亲这一点，我不确定是不是应该放在这里来讲，Dad这个角色可能大家会觉得很好啊，有什么问题？但是不觉得太过于好了吗？Iris与Zoey塑造的有血有肉，充满活力，但是Dad这个角色我觉得单纯是为了推动剧情而设计的，我感受不到“生机”。说是这么一说，但我也不知道该怎么具体表达...可能因为Dad的角色意义在这款游戏中是必不可少的吧。

在最终得知Iris爱上了Zoey后，父亲说了这样一段话（其实我觉得他早已看出来了）
"Iris, the only thing I've wanted for you is for you to be happy."
"I can't say I understand this, because I don't. Out of all the people on this earth who could give you a happy life with no hardships..."
"..."
"If Zoey is truly the one who makes you happy..."
"If she's truly the one you love, then...I won't get in your way."

且不论这个角色设计如何，能有这么开明的父亲，我相信Iris与Zoey一定会幸福的吧~

"Whatever happens from here on out, the good and the bad. We'll face it together."

[h1]结语部分[/h1]
总的来说，《Love Ribbon》是一款非常棒的视觉小说作品，虽然有些小瑕疵，但是瑕不掩瑜，强烈的推荐给各位视觉小说爱好者们。

最后游戏想表达的主题其实在一开始就已经告诉了我们，一条连接Iris与Zoey的丝带，爱的丝带，Love Ribbon。

38959931.review:
Just as many open their reviews with and as it says in the VN's description, this is about two sisters (100% fully blood-related sisters) falling in love. As soon as I realized that I immediately shrunk away from the "Add to Cart" button because that's typically not a line I'm so quick to be willing to cross. However, I was also curious to see what made the VN so fantastic that the reviews were "overwhelmingly positive" in spite of this fact, so I read some.

Many state the soundtrack being wonderful, they aren't wrong. It works with the mood of the scene and it's not overpowering or distracting for the most part. My one complain about it though is there are times where it stops then picks up again, but not to change tracks. Rather, it's the same track that stops abrupty before restarting. Sometimes it's during a slight scene transition such as if a different character begins speaking and the direction of the conversation changes, and other times it will stop in the middle of a scene for seemingly no reason and then restart. It can be a little jarring, but nothing that is bothersome or really takes away from the experience and instead something I noticed.

The story is beautifully done. Should you pursue the good ending, which would be expected as opposed to only wanting the bad ending and not the good one at all, the sisters relationship will remain on a romantic path. However, the story isn't all rainbows and unicorns per se where they decide to ignore the fact they're blood-related the entire time. Eventually they have to face reality, and they do. I won't say more though for spoilery reasons, but know they have to face the consequences of their actions towards the earlier stages of their relationship and more so towards the end of the story.

The writing is fluid. It will make you cheer them on, be concerned for them, and even at some parts make you feel anxious for their fate. I have very few complaints about the way everything is presented to you as the reader. But while I said I have few complaints, that's not to say I have none at all. During the more intimate scenes, the writing could feel awkward at times and sometimes had me thinking, "Yikes, please don't phrase it like that... Awkward..." but overall it was still sweet.

The characters themselves are both likeable. There were times Zoey really frustrated me and perhaps those who have finished Love Ribbon and those about to start it will understand. Iris is also just as guilty of that when feelings of desperation kick in, so their roles as far as their thought processes often swapped in those instances, which was nice to see and offered better insight as to who they were as indivuduals. However, it must also be remembered that these girls are still teenagers in high school and so their behavior, whatever it may be, is to be expected too. The endings are great, especially the good one is sweet, as probably expected. I do wish that there had been perhaps at least one more character portrait for the father as even though the dialogue box obviously indicates who's speaking, seeing only Iris and Zoey often made it feel like they were the only two in the story's universe. Maybe the addition of a friend or giving the "Loud Classmate" and "Haughty Classmate" actual names and faces instead of descriptive titles as they're slightly recurring like the father.

The CGs were all wonderful even the animated bits, although when the characters spasm a bit, was a little odd, but otherwise easy to brush off.

In conclusion I recommend this VN if you're willing to -- and not necessarily turn a blind eye to it -- accept the incestuous nature of Iris and Zoey's relationship. I think it's worth getting Love Ribbon albeit I will honestly say I may not have been so keen on considering it if it weren't on sale, which is when I got it at 30% off rather than at full price. There are only two endings to this story that you can achieve, so for those who like the VNs with multiple endings (say, 3+ at a minimum), this may not be for you. It's a linear story, your choices don't entirely matter and instead only alter the dialogue, until you get to the final choice, that's what will ultimately determine the outcome of the story for you. In all honesty, that was what also made me decide to get the game once it was on sale, the incest aside though that being a huge, and truly the main reason for my hesitance. Regardless, I'm glad I bought Love Ribbon even if I do wish there were a little more replay value to it in spite of it being understandable that there isn't. I think for those who get it, understanding the subject of the story (the sisters' relationship) and still going into Love Ribbon with an open mind won't be disappointed.

If you do choose to get Love Ribbon, don't forget to get the 1 Year Later update on the VN's news page in order to get the "Together" achievement as it may not already be installed with the game (manually adding it in is an easy task).
